## Examples for the useR 2017 Conference, Brussels


* This page will contain all examples for the [useR 2017](https://user2017.brussels/) conference tutorial on 
**Modelling the environment**.

* You can already contribute to the tutorial and discuss with us at the [R-SIG-DYNAMIC-MODELS](https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-sig-dynamic-models) mailing list.

## Come to the conference and meet us!

* https://user2017.brussels/
